Home Libraries People FAQ More
value::~value

Destructor.

Synopsis 
~value();
Description

The value and all of its contents are destroyed. Any dynamically allocated memory that was allocated internally is freed.

Complexity

Constant, or linear in size for array or object.

Exception Safety

No-throw guarantee.
